message:
Competitive Programming is one of the most effective attack/defence ability one can learn for the CDC intern matches.
KGP culture of gaining this buff is good but...somewhat disorganized. So, if you are confused which senior/batchmate to ask, don't know what or how or why(really!) to start then we give this page to you to read and gain almost an exhaustive resource.

DISCLAIMER: This page is written keeping in mind the workload and culture
of IITKGP!
Most of the resources available in KGP like informal/formal groups/societies are also mentioned in this page with their relevant details and the events they hold on the campus (DO CHECK THEM OUT).
ANYBODY can contribute (add/edit) to this page (please do, you will be doing a lot of help for the community 🙂) in any form you want.

https://wiki.metakgp.org/...

PS:
Some do it for the intern run
Some say it will not help in the long run
But deep down we all know that Competitive Programming is a lot of fun!.... sometimes😬

message:
Have you called your professor, only for them to not pick up your call? Want an urgent document to be signed?

Peace. We listened and brought out https://wimp.metakgp.org /

You can look where to find any professor and look at their time table.

P.S. No! The image is just for illustrations and your professor won't look like any of them :(

message:
We are sorry for creating this but WE needed it the MOST!

GYFT gives your timetable in ICS format which can be added easily to any calendar application so you don't miss classes UNKNOWINGLY!

Add to Google Calendar: https://support.google.co...

NOTE: We store your username for debugging purposes. No more data is stored by us, source code available at https://github.com/metakg...

message:
MFTP CRITICAL NOTICE!!

Recently we have been receiving a lot of complaints of Final year students' not receiving MFTP emails.

Due to certain circumstances, we had to remove all members and add them back using the list [of studying final and prefinal students] provided by CDC. Though we are thankful, the list is missing a few names.

We apologize for the inconvenience caused; if you or any of your friend is not getting emails, please apply for membership of the group. If your membership is not approved within 24 hours, message us immediately.

https://groups.google.com...

We arer highly grateful for their contributions and hope for .

Do checkout chill.metakgp.org and qp.metakgp.org

message:
As the placement season begins, please subscribe to MFTP: a google group which sends all the CDC notifications directly to your email inbox (because CDC apparently wants you to keep refreshing their website every 5 seconds, and we don't like that!).

As per the request from the Placement Committee, we have made joining the group on approval basis. Hence it might take the maintainers some time to approve your request.

https://wiki.metakgp.org/...

We thank you for your patience. Kindly share this post with your friends who are sitting for placements.

NOTE: We DO NOT store any personal information about you.

Returning from DP and setting up all the proxies can be a pain in the arse!

Thankfully due to efforts of Mukul Mehta, Shivam Kumar Jha and Sriyash Poddar, this process has been automated [for Linux].

Head over to http://proxymaster.heroku... and make your life a bit easier 🤩

NOTE: The bug in the download button has been fixed now. Thanks to Rashil Gandhi for the tip.

message:
Ever wondered how easy finding travel companions could get if only you could search? If only instead of doing '+1', you can see who all are in the group? Wondering if the group is already full or not? We have all these answers and more for you finding travel partners while returning from DP.

http://sarathi.metakgp.or...

Here we present Sarathi (developed by Arib Alam) to solve all of those worries and make you independent. We listened to a lot of requests from users and brought out a platform where you can find more easily. Here are some of the features:

- Login using your facebook itself.
- Search for groups that match your timings.
- Join an existing group or create your own.
- Change status and participants of the group as you find more companions.
- Get notifications for all the group activities.
- Connect with the group owner on messenger.
- And many more.

We are actively looking for contributions and suggestions on improving the service.

Source Code: https://github.com/metakg...
short_message: Ever wondered how easy finding travel companions could get if only you could search? If only instead of doing '+1', you can see who all are in the group?

message:
TL;DR, Get the ERP Auto-Login extension at bit.ly/kgperplogin : Please share the most as much as possible with your friends.

Are you one of those time-saving freaks; automating their entire life to just lie on the couch 😴? Well, Athitya and Shivam are such, and hence we have the ERP auto login chrome extension.

This chrome extension saves your ERP credentials (locally on YOUR system, not ours 🧐) and automatically logs you in the ERP. It also bypasses the annoying 'Essential Details' form (such a saviour 😍).

P.S. We DO NOT store any credentials; our source code is open source and can be scrutinized at https://github.com/metakg...
short_message: TL;DR, Get the ERP Auto-Login extension at bit.ly/kgperplogin : Please share the most as much
